uploadwizard-desc: Din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhiri kpatuɣili, nyɛla din yɛla bi to zaŋ ti ŋun mali li tumdi o tuma
tag-uploadwizard-description: Di kpe maa niŋmi ka di nyɛla din zaŋdi kpɛhira kpatuɣili maa n-niŋ li
tag-uploadwizard-flickr-description: Flickr din kpe maa niŋmi ka di nyɛla din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira kpatuɣili maa n-niŋ li
right-mass-upload: Din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira kpatuɣili ŋɔ tooi zaŋdi kol' bihi bɔŋ n-kp~hiri yim
action-mass-upload: Din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira kpatuɣili ŋɔ tooi zaŋdi kol' bihi bɔŋ n-kp~hiri yim
right-upwizcampaigns: Zaŋmi din zaŋ binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili yɛla mɔli gili
action-upwizcampaigns: Zaŋmi din zaŋ binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili yɛla mɔli gili
group-upwizcampeditors: Din zaŋ binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili tum tumdiba
group-upwizcampeditors-member: {{GENDER:$1|Din zaŋ binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili tum tumdiba}}
grouppage-upwizcampeditors: {{ns:project}}:Din zaŋ binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili tum tumdiba
api-error-parsererror: Sɛva maa garigimi ni JSON gban' shɛli din bi paai. Dimbɔŋɔ ni tooi nyɛla API yɛlmuɣisirili m-bala, bee din tooi niŋ ka proxy sɛva n-taɣiri a ni a di zaŋ kol' bihi ŋɔ kpɛhi.
api-error-noimageinfo: A ni zaŋdi shɛli kpɛhira maa kpɛya, amaa sɛva maa bi ti ti lahabali shɛli zaŋ chaŋ kol' bila maa polo.
mwe-upwiz-unavailable: A browser maa yaa bi saɣi din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira kpatuɣili maa yaa bee Javascript maa kpihimi, dinzuɣu ti ti yɛn wuhi a mi so' shɛli a ni yɛn doli zaŋ a kol' bila kpɛhi ka di be jalimbu. ([https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/UploadWizard#Compatibility View compatibility requirements]).
mwe-upwiz-extension-disabled: Gbambiɛlinli ŋɔ nyɛla din che tuma ka di nyɛla saha biɛla sunsuuni kpatuɣa yɛlmuɣisira. Saha ŋɔ na mɔmi ni a zaŋ din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira ka nyɛ zaɣ' maŋli la tum tuma.
mwe-upwiz-campaign-name-duplicate: Lahabali wuligibu din mali yuli tatabi pun benimi.
mwe-upwiz-campaign-unknown-error: Yɛlmuɣisiri shɛli din bi baŋ yina.
mwe-upwiz-api-warning-exists: Yu' shɛli [$1 another file] pun bela wiki ka mali kol' bila ŋɔ yuli kpee
mwe-upwiz-api-warning-was-deleted: Kol' bil' sh~li di benimi mali yuli ŋɔ maa."$1", amaa di di yihi labi ka a mi ku lahi tooi labisili na yaha. A kol' bila maa yi be di, mɔmi ni a taɣi li yu' shɛli.
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-localized-file-: Gaafara, ti bi tooi nya wuhibu a zuliya yɛltɔɣa ni. Ŋɔ $1 n-naɣi yina.
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-file-missing: Gaafara, ti bi tooi nya kol' bihi din wuhibu din di tu ni be kpe. Pahimi suɣilo bɔlimi ban su kpatuɣa yiko.
mwe-upwiz-tutorial-error-cannot-transfor: Gaafara, ti bi tooi nya anfooni sh~li din nyɛ wuhibu din saɣi a screen ŋɔ. Dimbɔŋɔ ni tooi nyɛla yɛlmuɣisiri wikimedia commons ni din ku yuui; labi mɔ di yi tooi biɛla.
mwe-upwiz-add-file-0-free: Piimi midiiya kol' bili shɛli a ni bɔri pii ti so maa
mwe-upwiz-add-file-flickr: Piimi anfooni flikr puuni ti so
mwe-upwiz-add-file-flickr-n: Zaŋmi afoonima din yi Flikr na pahi
mwe-upwiz-select-flickr: Zaŋmi a ni pii anfooni shɛŋa maa tahi
mwe-upwiz-flickr-disclaimer1:
Gbaŋ ŋɔ yɛn lahabali din yi Flickr na maa tahi flickr.com and subject to the
Flickr [https://www.flickr.com/help/terms/ terms of use] and [https://www.flickr.com/help/privacy-policy/ privacy policy].
mwe-upwiz-flickr-disclaimer2: Baŋmi ni a yi zaŋ kpatuɣili ŋɔ tum tuma, A IP addireesi mini di yɛlkam ni be Flickr ni.
mwe-upwiz-error-no-image-retrieved: Ti bi tooi lahi nya kol' bila din be $1.
mwe-upwiz-multi-file-select2:
Pimmi kol' bihi shɛŋa a ni  bɔri ni a zaŋ kpɛhi maa. Dihimi shift bingarili ŋɔ gbiba ka dihi piigi a ni bɔri ni a zaŋ shɛŋa kpɛhi maa zaɣ' bɔbigu yim. A ni tooi pii paai $1{{PLURAL:$1|file|files
}} n-zaŋ kpɛhi.
mwe-upwiz-getting-metadata: M-bɔri kol' bila lahabali mini di daŋyuli...
mwe-upwiz-override: Kuli zaŋ tahi di be shɛlikam
mwe-upwiz-override-upload: Zaŋmi kol' bila ŋɔ tahi di yi be shɛlikam.
mwe-upwiz-remove-upload: Yihimi kol' bila ŋɔ di taba din yɛn zaŋ tahi maa puuni
mwe-upwiz-file-all-ok: A ni zaŋ shɛŋa zaa tahi maa chaŋya!
mwe-upwiz-file-retry: Labi mo di bi tooi chaŋ
mwe-upwiz-next-file-despite-failures: Tuɣima di yi kuli be shɛlikam
mwe-upwiz-source-permission: Ŋun suli ti a la soli kam ni a tooi zaŋ ŋ kpɛhi
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-intro: Pahimi suɣilo kpɛhimi a ni nya kol' bihi ŋɔ zaa shɛli.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-custom-multi: Di yi niŋ kol' bihi maa zaa yibu shee, ŋun suli, ni copyrigts dariza nyɛ yim, din tooi niŋ ka kpɛhi li yim zaŋ ti di zaa.
mwe-upwiz-source-thirdparty-cases: Pumpɔŋɔ yɛlimi ti din che ka dihi tabili ni a mali soli ni a zaŋ tuma ŋɔ wuhi salo {{PLURAL:$1|tuuni ŋɔ|tuma ŋɔ}}:
mwe-upwiz-patent-dialog-title-filename: Zaligu ni yooi soya zaŋ ti: $1
mwe-upwiz-patent-dialog-title-warranty: Soya din yooi ti saha waɣilim
mwe-upwiz-patent-weapon-policy:
Ban mali li tumdi tuma kpaŋmi bɛ maŋa ka bɛ bi 3D binuyɛra din ŋmani gamu nɛma bee "lahabali din zabiri di maŋa zuɣu".
Commos dundɔŋnima ni tooi yihi lala binyɛra bɛ yi doli baŋ li.
mwe-upwiz-license-metadata-title: License zaŋ ti lahabal' ŋmahi din nyɛ t~cha konko (dimbɔŋɔ ʒe mi ti bachinima, ka pa ni koligu maa)
mwe-upwiz-license-metadata-statements-ti: License zaŋ ti metadata biɛhigu zaa (pa koligu maa)
mwe-upwiz-more-options: Zaŋmi di ni yi shɛli na mini di lahabali pahi...
mwe-upwiz-copy-statements-dialog: Metadata din be kol' bihi dimbalanima maa din be yaɣili ŋɔ yɛn zanila kol' bila din metadata ŋɔ zaani. A dihi tabili?
mwe-upwiz-copy-metadata: yaami lahabaya zaŋ ti din zaa kpe n-doli ...
mwe-upwiz-copy-title: Yaami taachi ( din tiri li kalinli di toli)
mwe-upwiz-copy-other: Yaami di lahabali shɛli din beni pahi
mwe-upwiz-caption-add: {{PLURAL:$1|0=Zaŋ lahabal' ŋmaa pahi|Zaŋmi zuliya shɛli y~ltɔɣa pahi}}
mwe-upwiz-desc-add: {{PLURAL:$1|0=zaŋmi buɣisigu pahi|zaŋmi buɣisa din be zuliya shɛli pahi}}
mwe-upwiz-location-button: Che ka di yina maapu zuɣu
mwe-upwiz-objref-pick-image: Zaŋmi bini maa kundivihira pahi anfooni ŋɔ zuɣu.
mwe-upwiz-objref-notice-existing-image: Anfooni sh~li pun benimi zaŋ ti lala bini ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-objref-notice-update-delay: A ni bɔri ni a labi neei gbambiɛlin' shɛli maa di saha biɛla.
mwe-upwiz-autoconverted: Kol' bila ŋɔ di nyɛla din lɛbigi di toli zaŋ ti $1 nachiinsi
mwe-upwiz-thanks-intro: Mbo a ni zaŋdi kpɛhiri maa!
mwe-upwiz-thanks-explain: A yi pa n-tooi zaŋ {{PLURAL:$1|kol' bila ŋɔ|kol' bihi ŋɔ}} tum tuma wikis, bee linkinima {{PLURAL:$1|it|them}}pɔhim zuɣu.
mwe-upwiz-thanks-wikitext: A yi bɔri ni a zaŋ kol' bila ŋɔ tum tuma, nyin yaami bachinima ŋɔ n-niŋ yaɣili ŋɔ:
mwe-upwiz-thanks-update-delay: A zaŋdi anfooni maa kpɛhira kalinl gbabiɛlinli maa ni di saha paai minti anu.
mwe-upwiz-thanks-url: A yi bɔri ni a linki li ti HTML, nyin yaami URL ŋɔ:
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-bad-filename-exte: Wiki ŋɔ bi saɣiri tiri kol' bihi yuya din naari ni "$1".
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-bad-filename-no-e: Wiki ŋɔ bɔri ni kol' bihi ŋɔ mali extention - kamani ".JPG di yuli bahigu.
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate-filenam: A pun zaŋdila kol' bila ŋɔ kpɛhira "$1".
mwe-upwiz-allowed-filename-extensions: Dini saɣi ti shɛŋa ni yaligi m-bɔŋɔ:
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate: Kol' bila di pun nyɛla din kpe wiki ŋɔ puuni.
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-duplicate-archive: Kol' bila di pun nyɛla din kpe wiki ŋɔ puuni, amaa ka di yuui ka yi.
mwe-upwiz-upload-error-stashed-anyway: Kuli zaŋ kpɛhi yi be shɛlikam
mwe-upwiz-deleted-duplicate-unknown-file: Kol' bila shɛli yuli din bi baŋ
mwe-upwiz-fileexists-replace-on-page: kol' bila din mali yuli ŋɔ kpee pun benimi. A yi bɔri ni a zaŋ ŋɔ zali di zaani, nyin chama gbambiɛlinli maa puuni nti [$2 $1] zaŋ li zali di zaani ni.
mwe-upwiz-fileexists-replace-no-link: Pahimi suɣilo piimi taachi shɛli dabam, dama taachi ŋɔ pun bela tuma ni kol' bil' shɛli puuni.
mwe-upwiz-blacklisted-details: Pahimi suɣilo piimi din be di ko, buɣisibu taachi ([$2 more info]).
mwe-upwiz-blacklisted-details-feedback: Pahimi suɣilo piimi din be di ko, buɣisibu taachi ([$2 more info]).• [$3 Send feedback]
mwe-upwiz-publish-details: Zaŋmi Kol' bihi ŋɔ wuhi salo
mwe-upwiz-publish-metadata: Zaŋmi lahabaya din kol' bihi ŋɔ ni zaa wuhi salo
mwe-upwiz-publish-metadata-error: Pahimi suɣilo malimi di yɛlmuɣisira zaa niŋ.
mwe-upwiz-metadata-help-title: Di zaŋdi metadata din bi kpa pahira
mwe-upwiz-metadata-help-content: A ni pa zaŋ a kol' bihi maa kpɛhi pumpɔŋɔ maa, a yi yɛn zaŋ metada pahi di zuɣu yɛn sɔŋmi che ka niriba pam yi pa tooi bo n-nyɛ li.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-skiptutorial: A ni tooi lahi che ka wuhibu ŋɔ labi tum [$1 your user preferences], under $2 → $3
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-author: Ninvuɣ' so ŋun ŋmaai anfooni ŋɔ ylui, bee ŋun peenti anfooni ŋɔ, ŋun booi li, ni din kam pahi.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-source: Tabibi kol' bila ni yi shɛli na- ni tooi nya URL, bee buku bee lahabali din zaŋ wuhi salo.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-sign:
A ni tooi zaŋ a wiki tuma yuli bee a yu' maŋli.
Di dibaayi maa puuni, di yɛn chaŋmi ti linki ti wiki yuli.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-title: Nammi buɣisigu din gahim ka yɛltɔɣa do palo ni ka folinsi beni. Chali kol' bila maa yɛligɔla, di yi niŋ ka di sh~li beni.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-caption: Zaŋmi kahigibu din nyɛ kol' bila ŋɔ ni shɛli kamani kuligi-yini m-pahi, ka di yɛn nyɛla yɛltɔɣ' shɛŋa di kpa li talahi.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-description: Che ka lahabali shɛŋa za din yɛn sɔŋ shɛba ka bɛ baŋ kol' bila ŋɔ ni nyɛ shɛli pahi.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-date: Piimi dabisili shɛli tuma ŋɔ ni daa zaŋ wuhi salo bee di tuuli zaŋ wuhi salo.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-categories: Zaŋmi a kol' bila maa pahi [$1 categories] din yɛn che ka di shee bɔbu ku to.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-other: Lahabali shɛli a ni bɔri ni a zaŋ pahi tuma ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-tooltip-location: [$1 Geocode a kol' bila maa] m-baŋ miidiya maa ni daa yaai lu~' shɛli.( Pa sahashɛlikak ka di kpa talahi ni a kpɛhi di biɛhigu shee zaŋ ti miidiya kam)
mwe-upwiz-file-need-file: Pahimi suɣilo zaŋmi binshɛli kpɛhi pɔi.
mwe-upwiz-deeds-need-deed: Pahimi suɣilo kahigi wuhi a ni nya kol' bila ŋɔ shɛli ni site ŋɔ ni tooi zaŋ li ku bukaata shɛm, ka di nyɛla a yɛn piila zaɣ' yini soya pam puuni.
mwe-upwiz-license-show-all: Zaŋmi license shɛli dabam tum tuma
mwe-upwiz-license-show-recommended: Zaŋmi site shɛli ti zaŋ ti a maa tum tuma
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-blank: Di tumi ni a kpe ni a tuma yuli bee a maŋmaŋa yuli din tu ni di kpe shɛli.
mwe-upwiz-error-latitude: Latitude maa tu ni di nyɛ kalinli bachi m-be -90 mini 90 sunsuuni.
mwe-upwiz-error-longitude: Longitude maa tu ni di nyɛ kalinli bachi m-be -180 mini 180 sunsuuni.
mwe-upwiz-error-altitude: Altitude maa tu ni di nyɛ kalinli bachi.
mwe-upwiz-error-heading: Di yɛlizuɣu tu ni di nyɛla kalinli bachi m-be 0 mini 360 sunsuuni.
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-too-long: A nua dihibu maa waɣi pam. Ŋmaami li jia $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-signature-too-short: A nua dihibu maa ji pam. Niŋmi li zaɣ' waɣinli $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-date-license-mismatch: A ni piigi dabisili shɛli maa bi taɣili license ($1) maa.
mwe-upwiz-error-date-license-unlikely: A ni piigi dabisili shɛli ni tooi pa viɛnyɛla, a yuli license($1) maa.
mwe-upwiz-error-too-long:
A ni kpɛhi binshɛli maa waɣi pam.
pahimi suɣilo che ka a ni zaŋ shɛli kpɛhi maa yi kuli galisi yaɣi $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-too-short:
A ni kpɛhi binshɛli maa pɔri pam.
pahimi suɣilo che ka a ni zaŋ shɛli kpɛhi maa yi kuli pɔri yaɣi $1 {{PLURAL:$1|character|characters}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-too-long:
A ni kpɛhi taachi shɛli maa waɣi pam.
pahimi suɣilo che ka a ni zaŋ shɛli kpɛhi maa yi kuli galisi yaɣi $1 {{PLURAL:$1|byte|bytes}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-too-short:
A ni kpɛhi taachi shɛli maa ji pam.
pahimi suɣilo che ka a ni zaŋ shɛli kpɛhi maa yi kuli ji yaɣi $1 {{PLURAL:$1|byte|bytes}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-bad-captions: Yɛlmuɣisira bela a lahabal' ŋmahi maa ni.
mwe-upwiz-error-bad-descriptions: Yɛlmuɣisira bela a buɣisa maa ni.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-blacklisted: Taachi ŋɔ mali la bachi shɛŋa din kpa. Pahimi suɣilo labi yuli li.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-senselessimagename: Pahimi suɣilo che ka taachi ŋɔ mali gbunni
mwe-upwiz-error-title-thumbnail: Dimbɔŋɔ ŋmanila thumbnail taachi. Pahimi suɣilo di zaŋ thumbnails lahi kpɛhi wiki ni yaha. Ka yo pa lala, pahimi suɣilo, mali di yuli maa niŋ ka di che ka di mali gbunni, ka ka thubnail prefix.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-extension: Di bi kpa ni a zaŋ kol' bila extentions pahi. Kuli timi li taachi shɛli ninsala ni ni tooi karim ka kpatuɣili mi bahi niŋ din kpalim.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-protected: Taachi ŋɔ kpinila gbambiɛlin' shɛli wiki puuni din kpari. Pahimi suɣilo, piimi shɛli dabam.
mwe-upwiz-error-title-duplicate:
Taachi ŋɔ pun kahigimi n-gari kol' bil ' yini shɛli zuɣu a ni yɛn zaŋ kpɛhi maa.
Bɛ nya Underscores nima ka di nyɛla fɔlinsi, kol' bila extentions din zaŋ pahi di toli.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-too-sho: Wikitext din be kpe ŋɔ ji pam ni bɛ ti li license.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-too-lon: A ni kpɛhi wikitext shɛli maa waɣi pam.
mwe-upwiz-error-license-wikitext-missing: A ni kpɛhi wikitext shɛli maa ka license maŋli shihira.
mwe-upwiz-error-patent-disagree: Di tumi ni a saɣi ti zalikpana ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-error-pageprops-missing-page: Di bi tooi bo n-nya gbambiɛlinli maa bimbɔra: Lala gbambiɛlinli maa (na) kani.
mwe-upwiz-error-pageprops-missing-prop: Di bi tooi bo n-nya gbambiɛlinli maa bimbɔra: Lala gbambiɛlinli maa (na) kani.
mwe-upwiz-error-submit-captions:
Anfooni di nyɛla din kpe viɛnyɛla, amaa binshɛli bi chaŋ dede di zaŋ kpɛhi maa puuni {{PLURAL:$1|caption|captions
}}.
mwe-upwiz-error-submit-captions-remedy: A yi bɔri ni mali li: kaami [[$1]] nti update lahabal' ŋmahi din be ni la.
mwe-upwiz-warning-categories-missing: Di tuya ni ŋari bɔɣ' shɛŋa zaŋ ti a ni kpɛhira binshɛŋa maa.
mwe-upwiz-warning-postdate: A ni pii dabisili shɛli maa nyɛla dahinshɛli dabisili.
mwe-upwiz-details-error-count: Di mali la {{PLURAL:$1|yɛlmuɣisir' yini| $1 yɛlmuɣisira}} zaŋ chaŋ {{PLURAL:$2|form|forms}}din do zuɣusaa ŋɔ. Malimi {{PLURAL:$1|yɛlmuɣisirili|yɛlmuɣisira}} maa niŋ, ka labi mo ni a zaŋ kpɛhi.
mwe-upwiz-details-warning-count: Shɛli {{PLURAL:$1|is one warning|are $1 warnings}} din mali {{PLURAL:$2|form|forms}}din be zuɣusaa ŋɔ. Ti bɔri ni a mali li zali {{PLURAL:$1|it|them}} ka naanyi tuɣi.
mwe-upwiz-too-many-files-text: A ni tooi zaŋla dimbɔŋɔ ko kpɛhi $1 {{PLURAL:$1|file|files}} yim amaa a mɔmi ni a zaŋ kpɛhi $2 {{PLURAL:$2|file|files}} di zaa kalinli. Pahimi suɣilo labi mɔ ni kol' bihi biɛla!
mwe-upwiz-file-too-large-text: A ni zaŋla kol' bihi din galisim nyɛ $1 ni a zaŋ kpɛhi.  A mɔmi ni a zaŋ kol' bila din nyɛ $2.
mwe-upwiz-dialog-warning: Ti bɔri ni ŋarila vo' shɛŋa zaa din bɔri ŋatibu. A bɔrimi ni a tuɣi ka bi mali ti ni kpahi a zuɣu ni zaŋ chaŋ binshɛŋa ŋɔ polo?
mwe-upwiz-campaign-view-all-media: Nyami miidiya shɛŋa zaa din kpe.
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old-100: Ŋun su li kpiya ka di gari yuun' kɔbiga din garila
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-old: Ŋun su li kpiya ka di gari yuum' pisopɔin din garila
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-art-70: Ʒeyimtali din labi peenti salo ni dama ŋun daa peenti li maa daa kpiya  ka di gari yuum' pisopɔin din garila ([$2 learn more])
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-ineligible: Di be jalimam pa ni mali copyright
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-ineligible-help: Niŋmi siɣa ni ŋɔ. Di tu ni anfooni maa be jelimbu, kamani green Circle bee Red square
mwe-upwiz-license-pd-textlogo:
Shihirili bintabindili din bachinima (wordmark
)yɛla bi to.
mwe-upwiz-license-copyrighted-free-use: Saligu gbubilimi, amaa ka ni tooi zaŋ tum tuun' shɛli, zaŋ tabili din kɔhira gba
mwe-upwiz-license-attribution: ka ni tooi zaŋ tum tuun' shɛli, zaŋ tabili din kɔhira, di yi niŋ ka ŋun zu saligu maa simdi ni o gbubi li.
mwe-upwiz-license-gfdl: GNU lahabaya sabi sɔŋ license din be yoli
mwe-upwiz-license-cc-head: Ŋun su tuma ŋɔ zaligu daa zaŋ li mi wuhi {{PLURAL:$1|Tuuni ŋɔ|tuma ŋɔ}} din zaligu jɛndi Creative Commons license
mwe-upwiz-license-cc-subhead: Pa creative Commons license zaa n-viɛli zaŋ site. Dihi tabili ni ŋun su zaligu zaŋla license nima ŋɔ shɛli tum tuma.
mwe-upwiz-license-flickr-head: Ŋun su tuma ŋɔ zaligu daa zaŋla bɛ tuma ŋɔ wuhi salo la {{PLURAL:$1|photo or video|photos or videos}} Flickr din license tuhi.
mwe-upwiz-license-flickr-subhead: Yulimi "License" yɛtɔɣ' zuɣu din be Flickr site yaɣili. Icon shɛŋa mini di yuya license bɛ ni zaŋ tum tuma maa tumi ni di saɣisi piibu shɛŋa din be kpe ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-license-public-domain-usa-head: Zaligu ŋɔ nyɛla din saha yaɣi USA tingbani ni.
mwe-upwiz-license-public-domain-usa-subh: {{SITENAME}} nyɛla din be USA, dinzuɣu di zaligu bi gbubi tuma ŋɔ lala tingbani maa ni.
mwe-upwiz-license-usgov-head: {{PLURAL:$1|Tuuni ŋɔ daa|Tuma ŋɔ daa}}  United States government n-daa tum li.
mwe-upwiz-license-custom-head: Daliri shɛli bi yuli bi bɔli zuɣusaa ŋɔ sa
mwe-upwiz-license-none-head: N nyɛ li la pɔhim zuɣu- m bi dihi tabili
mwe-upwiz-license-none: N niŋ yɛdda ni {{PLURAL:$1|tuuni ŋɔ nyɛla| tuma ŋɔ nyɛla}} zaligu ni bi gbubi shɛli bee din saɣi ti ni di yina salo ni. M baŋya ni n yi bi zaŋ license lahabal' shɛŋa din kpa talahi pahi di saha dede, {{PLURAL:$1|kol' bila|kol' bihi}} maa ni tooi yihi labi.
mwe-upwiz-license-generic-head: {{PLURAL:$1|tuuni ŋɔ nyɛla|Tuma ŋɔ nyɛla}} dni di zaŋ kpɛhi wiki ŋɔ ni
mwe-upwiz-license-generic: N labi yuli [[{{int:disclaimerpage}}|wiki ŋɔ noli chihibu]] ka zaŋ chaŋ m baŋsim tariga {{PLURAL:$1|tuuni ŋɔ nyɛla| tuma ŋɔ nyɛla}} din bi ka zlaigu taɣibu din yaɣi wiki ŋɔ zuɣu.
mwe-upwiz-license-confirm-remove: A dihi tabili ni a bɔri ni a yihi {{PLURAL:$1|din kpe ŋɔ|ŋan kpe ŋɔ}}?
mwe-upwiz-license-external: Kol' bila maa zali shɛli din doli dini yi site shɛli na n-nyɛ "$1": $2.
mwe-upwiz-license-external-invalid: Kol' bila maa zali shɛli din doli dini yi site shɛli na n-nyɛ "$1": $2. Amaa, wiki ŋɔ bi saɣi ti lala license `ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-license-photoset-invalid: Amaa, anfooni shɛli ka anfooninima yaɣili ŋɔ m-mali license shɛli din ni tooi zaŋ tum tuma site ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-url-invalid: URL shɛli a ni kpɛhi maa bi saɣi ti bee di tiritimi wuhiri ni di bi paai bee zaligu n-gbubi $1 anfooni bee anfooninima yaɣili maa bee di ku tooi zaŋmi tum tuma.
mwe-upwiz-user-blacklisted: A kai, anfooni ka $1 yaɣili din ni tooi zaŋ kpɛhi site ŋɔ.
mwe-upwiz-categories-missing: Yaɣa ŋɔ shɛli pooi la buɣigu gbambiɛlinli. A dihi tabili ni a sabi di yuli viɛyɛla?
mwe-upwiz-thumbnail-failed: Di kpɛya, amaa server bi tooi nya di tuui nya thumbnail.
mwe-upwiz-unparseable-filename: Ti bi tooi baŋ kol' bila ŋɔ yuli "$1"
mwe-upwiz-error-title-invalid: Taachi bi tuhi. Kpaŋmi a maŋa ka a yihi bachikob' kamani square bracket, colons, slashes, comparison operators, pipes ni curly brackets.
mwe-upwiz-feedback-title: Timi ti tibili zaŋ din zaŋdi binyɛra kpɛhira kpatuɣili ŋɔ polo.
mwe-upwiz-feedback-blacklist-subject: N ni zaŋdi shɛli kpɛhira maa taachi, di "$1" bi saɣi ti.
mwe-upwiz-errordialog-title: Chiriŋ di kamina a ni di zaŋdi tahira maa
mwe-upwiz-custom-date: Zaŋmi a ni bɔri dabisi yu' shɛli niŋ.
prefs-upwiz-interface: Ŋun mali baʒini tumdi tuma interface
mwe-upwiz-prefs-def-license-def: Zaŋmi default maa ni kuli be shɛm tum tuma
mwe-upwiz-prefs-def-license-custom: A ni bɔri default shɛli license
mwe-upwiz-prefs-def-license-custom-help: Polo ni tooi tum tuma la a yi pii bahigu piibu din do zuɣusaa ŋɔ la.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-license-name-help: Di yi niŋ ka fɔliŋga maa ni ka shɛli di ni di ti li default yuli.
mwe-upwiz-prefs-maxsimultaneous-upload: Di ni ni tooi laɣim tuun' shɛŋa zaŋ tahi kalinli
campaigns: Din zaŋd binyɛra kpɛhira kpaatuɣili tum tumdiba
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-heading: Sɔŋmi che ka anfoonima bo n-nya niŋ asama to sokam
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-description:
Commons mali la [[c:Commons:Structured_data/Computer-aided_tagging|new tool
]] din buɣisi yuya zaŋ ti anfooni shɛŋa a ni zaŋ kpɛhi a yi na bi zaŋ yuya pahi di zuɣu. A saɣiti yu' shɛŋa din  tuhi, a sɔŋdimi che ka anfooninima bɔbu bi to zaŋ ti salo.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-checkbox-label: Iin, ni bɔri ni yi gbuligima tibili ni zaŋ binshɛŋa kpɛhi maa yi taba din saɣi ni n labi yuli li.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-final-cta: Shili biya ni di pili tagging pumpɔŋɔ?[[c:Special:SuggestedTags|Give the tool a try]] ka di nyɛla a yɛn zaŋla anfooninima din yoli n-taagi taba saha ŋɔ!
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-set: Taali! A taɣi dimbɔŋɔ zali la saha shɛlikam [[c:Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|Preferences]].
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-unset: A ku lahi nya tibili gbiligibu ni a zaŋ a tuma kpɛhi.
mwe-upwiz-mv-cta-user-preference-set-fai: Ti bi tooi zaŋ a ni bɔri shɛli kpɛhi saha ŋɔ. Pahimi suɣilo kaani [[c:Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|Preferences]] n-ti piimi
